title: DoktorumOnline AI
opening: Welcome to your AI-powered health assistant
fill_required_fields: Please fill in the required fields to continue.
facebook_auth_coming_soon: Sign in with Facebook is coming soon
terms_accept_text_1: By continuing, you agree to the
warning: All medical information, comments, announcements, and promotional activities on the Doktorumonline.net website are for informational purposes only. They are in no way intended to direct individuals to diagnosis and treatment independent of their doctor.
about_app_info: DoktorumOnline AI is a mobile health assistant developed with Flutter and using the Firebase infrastructure, which analyzes users' symptoms with AI-powered chat to provide personalized health recommendations.
forgot_password_description: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you a password reset link.
forgot_password_send_mail: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will send you a link to reset your password.
verification_instruction: Click the link sent to your email to verify your account.
tutorial_help_button: Press this button to see the application instructions again.
tutorial_profile_card: You can click on the profile card to edit or activate the profile.
tutorial_add_profile: You can add a new profile here.
health_profiles_subtitle: Manage your health information and enable your AI doctor to serve you better.
empty_state_message:
No profiles added yet
Start by adding your first profile.
language_region_settings_placeholder: Language and region settings will be here
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the profile named "{profileName}"?
tutorial_home: Tap this button to start a new consultation. Fill in the necessary information, and DoktorumOnline will ask you additional questions.
tutorial_chat: You can view all previous complaints and conversations here. Tap on any to open the details.
tutorial_upload: Upload your lab results, blood tests, or prescription as a PDF; DoktorumOnline will summarize it and highlight critical findings in seconds.
tutorial_profiles: You can create separate profiles for different users and update their health information.
upgrader_prompt: A new version of the app is available!
upgrader_body: The new version {{appName}} {{currentAppStoreVersion}} is available! You are currently using version {{currentInstalledVersion}}.

complaint_form.info_text: Your complaint will be analyzed using your current health information. Please only state your complaint and its duration.

subtitle: Select a file or image for analysis
initial_status: Please select a PDF file or an image
must_select: You must select a PDF or image first.
tutorial_history: You can view your previous analyses here.
tutorial_select_file: Click this button to select your PDF or image. You can upload the medical report you want to analyze here.
delete_account_content: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?
delete_account_subtext:

error_requires_recent_login: For security reasons, you need to log in again. Please log out and log back in.
error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error_account_delete: An error occurred while deleting the account. Please try again.
logout_content: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
logout_error: An error occurred while logging out: {}
feedback_title: Send us your request or complaint
feedback_description: You can contact us for all your opinions, suggestions, and complaints.

full_form_tutorial: Start your complaint after filling in all the information

progress_completed_desc: You can now chat in detail with the AI
delete_analysis_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this analysis?

ai_greeting_no_questions: Hello {}, I am your personal health advisor, DoktorumOnline. The information you provided seems sufficient. I will evaluate your complaint and provide you with recommendations.
ai_intro_greeting: Hello {}, I am your personal health advisor, DoktorumOnline. I will ask some questions to better comment on your complaint. Answering these questions will help me provide better results.
ai_final_evaluation_intro: Based on the information you provided, here are my conclusions:
